metadata.key_specifications: 65V/3.5A Asynchronous Step-Down Converter, 4.5V to 65V operating input range, 3.5A output current, adjustable switching frequency, Power Good Indicator, External Soft-start, adjustable UVLO and hysteresis, current run-away protection, short circuit protection, thermal protection, available in DFN4x4-10 and ESOP8 packages

page_summaries.content:
JWH5123 Series
65V/3.5A Asynchronous
             Step-Down Converter

DESCRIPTION
The JW®H5123 series are current mode monolithic buck switching regulators. Operating with an input range of 4.5V~65V, the JWH5123 series delivers 3.5A of continuous output current with an integrated high side N-Channel MOSFET. At light loads, the regulator operates in low frequency to maintain high efficiency. Current mode control provides tight load transient response and cycle-by-cycle current limit.

The JWH5123 series guarantees robustness with short-circuit protection, thermal protection, current run-away protection, and input under voltage lockout.

The JWH5123 series is available in DFN4x4-10 package, the JWH5123S and JWH5123P are available in ESOP8 package, which provides a compact solution with minimal external components.

FEATURES
- 4.5V to 65V operating input range
- 3.5A output current
- 0.8V ± 1% internal voltage reference (JWH5123)
- 0.75V ± 1% internal voltage reference (JWH5123S/JWH5123P)
- Adjustable switching frequency
- Power Good Indicator (JWH5123/JWH5123P)
- External Soft-start (JWH5123/JWH5123S)
- Adjustable UVLO and hysteresis
- Current run-away protection
- Short circuit protection
- Thermal protection
- Available in DFN4x4-10 package (JWH5123)
- Available in ESOP8 package (JWH5123S/JWH5123P)

APPLICATIONS
- Industrial Automation and Motor Control
- Vehicle Accessories: GPS Entertainment
- USB Dedicated Charging Ports and Battery Chargers
- 12-V, 24-V and 48-V Industrial, Automotive and Communications Power Systems

Product Summary.content: The JWH5123 series are current mode monolithic buck switching regulators with an input range of 4.5V~65V, delivering 3.5A of continuous output current with an integrated high side N-Channel MOSFET. The regulators operate in low frequency at light loads to maintain high efficiency, and feature current mode control for tight load transient response and cycle-by-cycle current limit.

The JWH5123 series guarantees robustness with various protection features such as short-circuit protection, thermal protection, current run-away protection, and input under voltage lockout. The series offers adjustable switching frequency, power good indicator, external soft-start, and adjustable UVLO and hysteresis.

The JWH5123 series is available in compact DFN4x4-10 package (JWH5123), and ESOP8 package (JWH5123S and JWH5123P), providing a space-saving solution with minimal external components. Key features include 4.5V to 65V operating input range, 3.5A output current, 0.8V ± 1% or 0.75V ± 1% internal voltage reference.

The JWH5123 series finds applications in industrial automation and motor control, vehicle accessories like GPS and entertainment systems, USB dedicated charging ports and battery chargers, as well as 12-V, 24-V and 48-V industrial, automotive, and communications power systems.
